issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Support bucket map joins in tez.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12635732
Addressed review comments.
Address review comments.
The tez side of things in the CustomEdge and CustomVertex look good. +1. Left some minor comments.
Address Harish and Sid's comments.
More tests added and some minor fixes.
lgtm, +1 for the traits propagation and Join conversion pieces.
During run-time, there is an error without setting up the edge property correctly in the "sub-query as big table" case.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12637022
Failures unrelated. They pass locally.
Fix for final stage reducer having no #reducer settings.
Ran tests in my setup and the tests passed.
Committed to trunk and branch-0.13. Thanks for the reviews [~sseth], [~hagleitn], [~rhbutani]. Thanks [~alangates] [~thejas] for the test runs.

This adds *hive.convert.join.bucket.mapjoin.tez* to HiveConf.java without a description.  If you write a release note and include the description, I'll put it in the wiki and make sure it's added to the new HiveConf.java & hive-default.xml.template via HIVE-6586 after HIVE-6037 gets committed.

Hi Lefty,

This would be the change to the template file:
{code}
<property>
  <name>hive.convert.join.bucket.mapjoin.tez</name>
  <value>false</value>
  <description>Whether joins can be automatically converted to bucket map joins in hive when tez is used as the execution engine.</description>
</property>
{code}

Thanks
Vikram.

Hi Chris,

I completely cleaned my .m2 and built this and it passes. I think the tez folks fixed this spelling issue in 0.4.0-incubating-SNAPSHOT and beyond. Hive is currently dependent on 0.4.0-incubating only. This works with that version of tez.

Thanks
Vikram.

Hi Chris,

I completely cleaned my .m2 and built this and it passes. I think the tez
folks fixed this spelling issue in 0.4.0-incubating-SNAPSHOT and beyond.
Hive is currently dependent on 0.4.0-incubating only. This works with that
version of tez.

Thanks
Vikram.






-- 
Nothing better than when appreciated for hard work.
-Mark
Thanks for the clarification. We are using a newer version of Tez, which caused the problem.

*hive.convert.join.bucket.mapjoin.tez* is documented in the wiki here:

* [Configuration Properties -- Tez -- hive.convert.join.bucket.mapjoin.tez |https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.convert.join.bucket.mapjoin.tez]
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
